title: RT News - October 29, 2019 (12:00 MSK)
text: The Pentagon says it's 'not ready' to release video evidence to back up the claim it's killed the leader of Islamic State in Syria. We look at how the world's most-wanted terrorist avoided detection for so long. The legal team of Trump's former security adviser who was charged with lying to investigators alleges Michael Flynn's testimony was altered by the FBI. French police have arrested an 84-year-old man suspected of injuring two people during an attack on a mosque that, as a new poll finds most people in the country think Islam is incompatible with French society.
description: The Pentagon says it's 'not ready' to release video evidence to back up the claim it's killed the leader of Islamic State in Syria
